title: How to Get a Circular Paddle in Laser Hockey on Wii Play

steps.headline: Go to Laser Hockey on Wii Play.
Hold down A and B at the same time during the countdown right before the game starts.
Use the new circular paddle you should have just gotten!

text: Go to Laser Hockey on Wii Play.  Hold down A and B at the same time during the countdown right before the game starts.  Use the new circular paddle you should have just gotten!
